Dear Mazen

It was a pleasure speaking with you earlier.

Following our discussion, i kindly request your support in securing the endorsement of De Marly Red Sea mall. The mall management had initially expected to receive it today but i will try to extend the deadline until tomorrow. 

Thanks in advance.
